captions:
💥🎬 [𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨] BORNES RECYCLAGE ramps-up with a new Lidex 1300T !

« Our Lidex can go up to 70t/hr. It has a rail breaker and can handle heavy scrap when needed. In the crane, thanks to the automatic cycle, our operator can prepare the next load while the scrap previously loaded is still being processed. No time is lost ! » Charles Bornes 

M. Bornes also prizes the total cooperation shown throughout the project including the recommendations for the most efficient layout of the machine on site, the supply of the civil engineering guide drawings, the logistic operations, the assembly & commissioning of the machine, not forgetting the training of operators and technicians.

🤝 Thanks again to the Bornes family for their trust.
Wich one would you choose ? 650, 700, 800 or 1000T ? 🤩Wich one would you choose ? 650, 700, 800 or 1000T ? 🤩
🇫🇷 New video at BORNES RECYCLAGE coming soon ! #Lidex1300🇫🇷 New video at BORNES RECYCLAGE coming soon ! #Lidex1300

[𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓 𝐋𝐄𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐓 𝐑𝐀𝐍𝐆𝐄]

Selecting the right hydraulic shear depends on the type, rate and volume of material being processed, but also where the machine will work. 

Thanks to a very large range of machines, we can accommodate any operation, from the smallest to the largest scrap yard facilities, with a product that will help bring success and growth to a recycler’s business.

Find out more about our scrap shears  : https://lnkd.in/ertBPuHn
[𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓 𝐋𝐄𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐓 𝐑𝐀𝐍𝐆𝐄]

Selecting the right hydraulic shear depends on the type, rate and volume of material being processed, but also where the machine will work. 

Thanks to a very large range of machines, we can accommodate any operation, from the smallest to the largest scrap yard facilities, with a product that will help bring success and growth to a recycler’s business.

Find out more about our scrap shears  : https://lnkd.in/ertBPuHn

🌎⚙️📦🚀

Wherever you are and whatever the time, parts availability is key.

Family-owned company BORNES RECYCLAGE took delivery of a 1,300-tonne side compression shear Lidex. With this new heavy-duty machine, the scrap metal recycling expert is laying the foundations of its future development.

Some key specs :

▪️Up to 70 t/hour
▪️Full automatic cycle
▪️Cross head in cast steel for a better resistance
▪️Ultra-rapid cutting blades replacement system 

🔗 Read full article in the Lefort Mag #2

𝟏𝐬𝐭 𝐋𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐋𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐱 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐚𝐢𝐰𝐚𝐧 🇹🇼

Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first hydraulic shear Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations! 👏🏼𝟏𝐬𝐭 𝐋𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐋𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐱 𝐢𝐧 𝐓𝐚𝐢𝐰𝐚𝐧 🇹🇼

Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first hydraulic shear Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations! 👏🏼

The most advanced side compression shears on the market : The LEFORT® Lidex. 

✔️ Full automatic cycle
✔️ From 1000 to 2000T of cutting force 
✔️ Control of operating parameters 
✔️ Increased productivity (up to 25%)
✔️ Watch the video below… 

Download the new brochure 
👉🏼 https://lnkd.in/eHQt3fBt

Depending on configuration and utilization , Lidex side compression shears can reach very high production levels, up to 115 t/h and productivity gains of 25%.
 
Till now, the Lidex are the only scrap shears with side compression to offer a complete automatic cycle.
 
This unique function is made possible mainly by two major innovations :

✔️innovative kinematics for the preload table which allows dumping of scrap metal directly into the pusher area, and thus reducing the number of movements
 
✔️a high amplitude lid designed to exert exceptional compaction power and efficiency to reduce cycle times.

Read more : https://lnkd.in/efX56KbM

🎻 C’est une première, le groupe LEFORT® et l’Orchestre Français des Jeunes (OFJ) se rapprochent pour un partenariat peu courant dans l’industrie tout comme dans la musique classique. 

Fawaz Ezzat, Group After Sales Director chez Lefort témoigne  : 

« Le lien ne semble a priori pas évident, mais les similitudes entre l’orchestre et l’industrie sont confondantes. J’ai eu la chance d’intégrer l’OFJ lors des sessions 2006, 2007 et 2008.

Avec du recul, il est évident que l’orchestre m’a apporté énormément en termes de management et de conduite de projet. Être musicien d’orchestre, c’est savoir faire du lien entre les éléments, écouter, s’exprimer, apprendre à gérer son stress, anticiper une échéance, rebondir après un échec. Ces compétences qui deviennent naturelles dans le monde musical, sont également une nécessité dans le monde industriel. » 

Découvrez-en plus sur cette annonce en cliquant le lien : https://lnkd.in/dKeTs_9W🎻 C’est une première, le groupe LEFORT® et l’Orchestre Français des Jeunes (OFJ) se rapprochent pour un partenariat peu courant dans l’industrie tout comme dans la musique classique. 

Fawaz Ezzat, Group After Sales Director chez Lefort témoigne  : 

« Le lien ne semble a priori pas évident, mais les similitudes entre l’orchestre et l’industrie sont confondantes. J’ai eu la chance d’intégrer l’OFJ lors des sessions 2006, 2007 et 2008.

Avec du recul, il est évident que l’orchestre m’a apporté énormément en termes de management et de conduite de projet. Être musicien d’orchestre, c’est savoir faire du lien entre les éléments, écouter, s’exprimer, apprendre à gérer son stress, anticiper une échéance, rebondir après un échec. Ces compétences qui deviennent naturelles dans le monde musical, sont également une nécessité dans le monde industriel. » 

Découvrez-en plus sur cette annonce en cliquant le lien : https://lnkd.in/dKeTs_9W

LEFORT® Lidex 2000T en phase finale d'assemblage chez un acteur incontournable du recyclage !

🫱🏼🫲🏻 Créée en 1983, l’entreprise familiale et indépendante GUYOT environnement collecte +400.000 tonnes de ferraille chaque année. Pour poursuivre son développement, elle a choisi une presse cisaille à compression latérale LIDEX, modèle intégré désormais à la gamme LEFORT.

⚙️ Cette « belle bête » affiche une force de coupe gigantesque de 2000 tonnes, une grande largeur de coupe de 1500 mm, une caisse de 10 m x 2,60 m et une motorisation de 8 x 110 kW. 

📈 Avec cette machine hors-normes, l’entreprise pourra atteindre des capacités de production jusqu’à 110 tonnes/heure ! 

+ d'infos très prochainement...LEFORT® Lidex 2000T en phase finale d'assemblage chez un acteur incontournable du recyclage !

🇬🇧 Jebb Metals have now put to work their new Koloss 1000 TS. This Lefort shear/baler is proving to be a real head turner as it sits proudly at the top of their yard. 

💥 Delivered to site in three main pieces the machine is assembled on a foundation frame and commissioned within two weeks. The machine is very productive on all grades of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, shearing with the 1000T window crosshead or baling with the 180T baling ram. 

💪🏽 The power, strength and speed of its cutting is giving very pleasing results for its new owners. This machine, fitted with the 600HP Scania diesel engine, operators control cabin and tunnel pusher ram is easily capable of 25-30 Tonnes per hour of production, depending upon material and cut length. 

We wish Philip & Stephen all the best for the future with their new Lefort Koloss 1000 TS 🙌

𝐋𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐮𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐢𝐥𝐬 𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐱 𝟏𝟐𝟓𝟎 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐥𝐨𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐛𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤𝐬. 🇺🇸

Equipped with a high-performance 550 hp engine and a 7m box, the Trax 1250 delivers an impressive cutting force of 1,250 tons (1,375 us tons). Thanks to its crawler tracks, the machine moves effortlessly across sites, offering unmatched flexibility for both on-site operations and recycling facilities.
 
But the true game-changer lies in its integrated loading table/hopper. This innovative configuration significantly boosts productivity by allowing continuous feeding of the shear and reducing material handling. During the compression/shearing cycle, the operator can already prepare the next batch by loading the hopper – eliminating idle time.

Read more : https://lnkd.in/eHadwe6A𝐋𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐮𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐢𝐥𝐬 𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐱 𝟏𝟐𝟓𝟎 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐥𝐨𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐛𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤𝐬. 🇺🇸

Discover the new Lefort TRAX 1250 with loading hopper, in action ! 

With this configuration, the TRAX 1250 ensures full on-site autonomy and superior productivity — helping you work faster, smarter, and more effectively.
